name: MakingCosmetics - Cholesterol NF & Ceramide Complex
description: MakingCosmetics offers pharmaceutical-grade Cholesterol NF 831 and a comprehensive Ceramide Complex for barrier repair formulations. Cholesterol is an essential skin lipid that constitutes approximately 25% of the stratum corneum's lipid matrix. The Ceramide Complex provides a multi-lamellar system of ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids that restores the skin barrier and improves moisture retention.
notes: Excellent resource for small-scale formulators and R&D. NF/USP grade cholesterol ensures pharmaceutical quality. Cholesterol's hydrophobic nature helps irritated, dry, and chapped skin. Also suitable for dry, damaged hair applications.
